attributes.action: Dismiss the chancellor of the exchequer  Alistair Darling over the HMRC lost information fiasco
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This petition is put forward in the hope that for once a government minister can be held to account for the grossly negligent mismanagement of his department which has  had the unhappy consequence of exposing 25 million british citizens to the threat of fraud by way of identity theft.This petition should be unneccessary as one would hope that any minister with an ounce of dignity presiding over this fiasco would have resigned upon learning of it.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
